project.name: Ambari
project.description: Ambari is a web-based tool for performing installation, management, and monitoring of Apache Hadoop clusters. The stack of components that are currently supported by Ambari includes Falcon, HBase, HCatalog, HDFS, Hive, MapReduce, Oozie, Pig, Scoop, Storm, Templeton, Tez, YARN and Zookeeper.
